articleinfo.title: GT 6.0 Migrating Guide for GSI C

article.simpara: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT5.2
section.simpara: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT5.2.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT5.0
section.simpara: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT5.0.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT4.2
section.simpara: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT4.2.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT4.0
section.simpara: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT4.0.

section.title: Migrating from GT3
section.simpara: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT3.

section.title: Migrating GSI from GT2
section.simpara: Nothing should have to be done when migrating from GT2.
